content: a soft cozy textured bathmat and basket worked in linen stitch the designs are easy to knit yet look impressive with a polished non-handmade appearance the basket is optionally finished with leather handles attached using leather cord both patterns are easy to adjust in size if desired if you enjoyed this free pattern i d love for you to visit and subscribe to my youtube channel and also share your creations on instagram using #tidytextures to support my work thank you so much https //www youtube com/@daniafter9to5 https //www instagram com/dani_after_9_to_5/ hl=en
